channel.title: Life management on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in Life management on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: The benefit in 'Archaic' Email interfaces
item.description: This post outlines my current email setup and penchant for using mu4e, an email client available for Emacs. mu4e is a text based email interface. Beyond mu4e, there are other options available like notmuch and mutt. I have briefly experimented with mutt, which is breath-takingly fast in email search, but mutt has to be coupled with another front end to be used within Emacs. The philosophy and system behind notmuch (leveraging the Gmail tag based approach) differ from mu4e.
